title: Dan Rather’s Advice for Newly Single Kylie Jenner
text:
Dan Rather stopped by the WWHL Clubhouse, because that’s just the kind of week it’s been, and he had some sagely words of calm for the nation. We should remember not to stress eat during impeachment proceedings, remember that the Democratic presidential hopefuls will thin themselves out soon, and that puppies are a good post-breakup balm. Andy Cohen asked Rather if he had any advice for Kylie Jenner after splitting with Travis Scott, and he did: “With great respect, I would say get a dog. If you already have a dog, get another dog.” With great respect to Mr. Rather, Kylie Jenner already has so many dogs. Also a baby. She could get another chicken, though. That might be nice.

Related
description: Dan Rather stopped by Watch What Happens Live with Andy Cohen to give advice to Kylie Jenner. Rather says that after breaking up with Travis Scott, she should get a dog. But that’s not counting Norman, Bambi, and the other pooches. Also Stormi.
